meaningInfo: You have a surplus (extra) stool, and someone wants it. But, they need to know more about it, so you describe it in great detail. Imagine yourself doing just that. Every screw and nubbin is described.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>describe</kanji> the features of the stool to <reading>Jo</reading>-Anne (<ja>じょ</ja>).
readingInfo: Jo-Anne is really excited about this stool. It's the perfect height for her (remember, she's on the shorter side to distinguish <ja>じょ</ja> from <ja>じょう</ja>). She pays attention to you describing the stool while sitting on it and spinning around. Have her ask for you to describe it more.
